title: CLI commands: ingest, query, analyze, patterns, insights, runs, status, init
description: Wire all packages into cobra CLI commands. Each command handles flags, I/O, and error reporting. Support --json flag for machine-readable output where relevant.

title: SQLite database layer with migrations
description: Implement db package: SQLite connection using modernc.org/sqlite (pure Go, no CGO), schema migrations, connection management. Tables: runs, patterns, insights, pattern_matches. All indexes.

title: Run ingestion with pattern detection
description: Implement ingest package: parse run record JSON, validate required fields, insert into DB, detect built-in patterns (tests-skipped, tests-failed, lint-failed, scope-creep, quick-failure, long-running, no-test-files, error-retry), create pattern_matches.

title: Query engine with relevance matching
description: Implement query package: accept task description, match against stored runs by tag overlap and keyword similarity, retrieve relevant patterns and insights, format as injectable text block.

title: Project scaffolding: go mod, directory structure, main.go
description: Initialize Go module, create directory structure (cmd/loop, internal/db, internal/ingest, internal/analyze, internal/query, internal/report), create main.go with cobra CLI skeleton.

title: Analysis engine (pattern aggregation and insight generation)
description: Implement analyze package: scan un-analyzed runs, aggregate patterns, compute stats (pass rates, failure modes, duration trends), generate insights as human-readable recommendations.

title: Report generation
description: Implement report package: generate summary reports (overall stats, top patterns, recent insights, trend analysis). Support daily/weekly cadence filtering.
